summary: The story unfolds about the murder of an old man living in a remote village and six locals who may have been connected with the murder. Things get messy when the dead man turns out to be an... See full summary Â»
cast: Leszek Lichota|Agnieszka Podsiadlik|Wieslaw Komasa|Maciej Mikolajczyk|Lukasz Simlat|Izabela Kuna|Zbigniew Stryj|Krzysztof Franieczek|Tamara Arciuch|Ireneusz Koziol|Magdalena Kuta|Jacek Pluta|Julia Kijowska|Jacek Polaczek|Andrzej Franczyk|Ewa Pajak|Mieczyslaw Kadlubowski|Jakub Ulewicz|Miroslawa Maludzinska|Magdalena Jezierska|Krzysztof Lach|Kajetan Stabeusz|Katarzyna Bargielowska|Pawel Czajor|Grzegorz Emanuel|Marcin Makowski|Magdalena Myszkiewicz|Pawel Niczewski|Konrad Pawicki|Jakub Wieczorek|Witold Wielinski
title: Lincz
